Title: Directs the department of health to establish an alternative payment methodology (APM) for Federally Qualified Health Centers to preserve and improve patient access to fertility care
Summary: Directs the department of health to establish an alternative payment methodology (APM) for federally qualified health centers to preserve and improve patient access to fertility care.
ActClause: AN ACT directing the department of health to establish an alternative payment methodology (APM) for federally qualified health centers to preserve and improve patient access to fertility care
